# Getting Started Guide

This guide shows how to log in to the application.

## Prerequisites

- A valid account
- Modern web browser

## Login Steps

1. Navigate to https://example.com/login
2. Click the "Sign In" button
3. Enter your email in the email field
4. Enter your password in the password field
5. Click "Submit"
6. Verify you see the "Welcome to Dashboard" message

## Creating a New Account

1. Go to https://example.com/signup
2. Fill in your name
3. Enter a valid email address
4. Create a strong password
5. Click "Create Account"
6. Check your email for verification
